derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent. (originally denoting a violin-like instrument): from Old French viele, from Provençal viola; probably related to fiddle

entry.def: Viols are a family of musical instruments that are made of wood and have six strings. You play the viol with a bow while sitting down.

means.word_mean: 1. any of a family of bowed stringed instruments that preceded the violin family
